1.title: CurlyCoilyTresses
1.subtitle: At CurlyCoilyTresses, we create products that help soothe scalps and moisturize and hydrate hair. We've helped thousands just like you to lengthen and strengthen their hair; soften, moisturize and hydrate their hair; and improve the overall appearance of their hair.

products.name: Enrich Moisturizer Styler + Organic Pumpkin Seed Oil Serum + Nourish Treatment Masque
products.description: Our best selling kit! Our customers say our products leave their hair soft, hydrated, moisturized and touchably luscious! And you get all this without fragrance headaches! It's true! We avoid all fragrances and focus on what really matters, eliminating dryness and getting lasting moisture, even days after wash day!

products.name: Travel + Discovery Enrich Moisturizer Styler + Nourish Treatment Masque
products.description: A top selling kit! Our customers say our products leave their hair soft, hydrated, moisturized and touchably luscious! And you get all this without fragrance headaches! It's true! We avoid all fragrances and focus on what really matters, eliminating dryness and getting lasting moisture, even days after wash day!

products.description: A top selling kit! Our customers say our products leave their hair soft, hydrated, moisturized and touchably luscious! And you get all this without fragrance headaches! It's true! We avoid all fragrances and focus on what really matters, eliminating dryness and getting lasting moisture, even days after wash day!

1.title: Eb + Flo Boutique
1.subtitle: Eb and Flo started out as just a vision and manifested in 2020. Our CEO, Ebony Hunter, is a strong believer in living out your dreams while not only looking good but feeling good too. Our mission is to provide styles that flow with you from moment to moment, whether you’re making a quick run to the grocery store or meeting the girls for brunch. With comfort and quality in mind, we make looking lavish easy. Look good, feel good.

products.name: Classic Boss Lady Track Suit
products.description: Chic track suit for the lady on the go. Throw it on for a quick trip to the grocery store, a nail appointment, or dress it up for a cute brunch look.

products.name: Tedy Soft Sherpa Jacket
products.description: The warmest and most comfortable jacket you'll ever own! The Teddy Sherpa Jacket feels like a warm hug or like you're wearing a blanket. Features a drawstring hem that allows you to snatch that waist hunny *snap*snap*

products.name: "Thou shall not try me" T-Shirt
products.description: Mood 24:7! Let the folks know the deal in this super soft tee.

2.title: "ABC I Love Me"
2.subtitle: ABC I Love Me takes Black children along for a journey of self love, confidence, and adventure while teaching young learners positive affirmations for each letter of the alphabet. This book encourages children to accept their unique qualities, and promotes positive self-esteem and a healthy lifestyle.

2.title: Does racism affect how you vote?
2.subtitle: Nate Silver has data that answers big questions about race in politics. For instance, in the 2008 presidential race, did Obama's skin color actually keep him from getting votes in some parts of the country? Stats and myths collide in this fascinating talk that ends with a remarkable insight.

3.title: Alter Planning Co.
3.subtitle:
Alter Planning Co was founded by scottie., a young artist and entrepreneur who grew tired of looking for the perfect planner every year. She crafted each product to help fuel the creativity and productivity of those who used it. 

As an artist, scottie. has a deep understanding of the need for structure and wants to inspire more people to create routines and form in their life.

3.title: Golde
3.subtitle: We're on a mission to make wellness easy, accessible and fun for all. To us, self-care means feeling like your best self. We believe that being well should feel good. That means products that fit seamlessly into your lifestyle, not the other way around.

products.name: Pure Matcha
products.description: Enjoy the ultimate green superfood in its purest form: matcha, made with 100% pure, shade-grown green tea leaves from Uji, Japan.

products.name: Papaya Bright Face Mask
products.description: This brightening mask is made with 100% pure, edible superfoods. Featuring superfruits like lucuma, papaya, and sea buckthorn berry, it's packed with vitamin C and smells like a tropical vacation.

products.name: Skin Hydration Ade
products.description: Sip + glow to support skin hydration with the power of superfoods.

4.title: Center for Policing Equity
4.subtitle: Your donation fuels our ability to lead on the police reform that's necessary. Together we will create a public safety system that protects and preserves justice for all.

4.title: Tyre Nichols Memorial Fund
4.subtitle: This fundraiser will help cover the costs of mental health services for Tyre Nichols' parents and  time off from their jobs. Additionally, they want to build a memorial skate park for Tyre, in honor of his love for skating and sunsets.

5.title: My Beautiful Fluff
5.subtitle: Clothes designed with curves in mind. Each shirt is cut to accommodate curves and fluff with custom to cut to my size chart with sizes L to 5XL.

5.title: Olamina Botanicals
5.subtitle: We are a Black femme-owned apothecary crafting tinctures, teas, syrups and salves in unceded Lenni Lenape territory. Our mission is to help people ground into their own innate power as healers, draw strength from the plant world—and act on behalf of the planet.

products.name: Fire Cider - Immune Tonic
products.description: Fire Cider is a spicy, garlicky, alcohol-free folk immunity remedy that can be taken daily to ward off the sniffles.

products.name: Sore Throat Spray
products.description: Tingle and tickle the microorganisms responsible for your sore throat into oblivion with our Sore Throat Spray.

products.name: Sweet Dreams - Sleep Tonic
products.description: Formulated to help one ease into peaceful slumber, Sweet Dreams features reputed nervine Hops, a sedative that induces deep sleep without headache or groggy feeling upon waking.

6.title: John Hope - Biography
6.subtitle: John Hope was an important African American educator and race leader of the early twentieth century. In 1906 he became the first Black president of Morehouse College—the alma mater of Martin Luther King Jr.—in Atlanta.

6.title: Abolish Prison Labor in the USA
6.subtitle: Prison labor is a form of modern American slavery used by multiple large corporations across the world. Under the 13th Amendment to the United States Constitution, slavery was merely reformed rather than abolished. Racial justice in the USA cannot be achieved until prison labor is abolished completely.

7.title: YTPshop - African Clothing
7.subtitle: All YTPshop products are crafted by women in Nigeria and the fabrics are carefully sourced from West African markets. YTPshop products are made with high-quality material, cutting edge tailoring, vibrant colors, and are affordably priced.

7.title: Lyfestyle Clothing
7.subtitle: It’s our goal to produce quality clothing that embodies our inspirations of the moment. We only source premium fabrics, usually directly from NYC's garment district. All of our cut and sewn garments are made at our Brooklyn factory. We strive to build a strong brand by consistently making quality clothing that our customers can be proud to wear.

products.name: Taffy Multicolor Lyfestyle Sweatsuit
products.description: Chenille Patch. True to Size. Made in Brooklyn. Available in other colors.

products.name: Multicolor Turtleneck Lyfestyle Dresses
products.description: Chenille Patch. 94.5% Rayon / 5.5% Spandex. Fitted. Sewn in Brooklyn

products.name: Serpent Lyfestyle Hoody
products.description: 8oz Mid-Weight Fleece. Velvet Print. True to Size. Printed in Brooklyn

8.title: End Police Militarization and Over-Policing
8.subtitle: The tragic and unnecessary killings of George Floyd, Breonna Taylor, Tony McDade – and countless Black people at the hands of law enforcement – confirms what we've known for too long: Lawmakers must take serious action to fix the racist policing systems in our country.

8.title: Beyond the Numbers: The Experiential Effects of Stereotype Threat on Students of Color at TCU
8.subtitle: This study aims to examine if and how the effects of negative stereotypes of students of color are felt beyond the statistical measures of academic success, reaching into the classroom and social experiences of these students.

9.title: Askanya
9.subtitle: Les Chocolateries Askanya is Haiti’s first and only premier bean-to-bar chocolate company. We exclusively use Haitian cacao to produce our chocolates in our facility located in Ouanaminthe, Haiti.

products.name: Bouquet Vert
products.description: Bouquet Vert is our Lime Chocolate Bar - a dark and rich cacao bar infused with with mellow, floral and citrus - feels like a rich earth and lime trees in full bloom. There are notes of candied lime and something toasty. It's a slow melt, but that only helps savoring each new layer of flavor.

products.name: Paradis
products.description: Paradis has a rich and creamy texture, with delicious chocolate flavors and subtle fruit flavors, providing additional complexity.

products.name: Wanga Nègès
products.description: Wanga Nègès is creamy and smooth, with a rich, chocolate taste and a complex mélange, from caramel to dried fruit.

9.title: The Case for Reparations
9.subtitle: Two hundred fifty years of slavery. Ninety years of Jim Crow. Sixty years of separate but equal. Thirty-five years of racist housing policy. Until we reckon with our compounding moral debts, America will never be whole.

10.title: Beauty Bakerie
10.subtitle: A single mother and breast cancer survivor, Cashmere Nicole founded Beauty Bakerie in 2011 as a new lipstick brand that was vegan, non-toxic and cruelty-free.

products.name: Chocolate Therapy Sugar Sticks
products.description: A castor oil infused lip liner collection that delivers high-quality custom coverage while lining & defining your lip look. Just add 1/2 cup of sugar and everything will be pretty sweet!

products.name: Eyelash Icing Waterproof Mascara
products.description: Enter the Beauty Bakerie freezer and start ice-ing with our NEW waterproof and volumizing Eyelash Icing Mascara. The perfect topper for your baked beat, Eyelash Icing Mascara will freeze your lashes in place for all-day, all-night long-lasting wear.

products.name: Blending Egg Beauty Sponges
products.description: Cooked up with you in mind, Blending Egg Beauty Sponges were uniquely created to fit in the palm of your hand for seamless blending. Try a recipe with a dash or two of Cake Face Concealer and bake until your heart's content with Flour Setting Powder. Blending Eggs will be your new favorite tool for eggs-traordinary cakin' that's hard to beat! Hehe.

products.name: Kultured Misfits Tracksuit (Crew + Joggers)

11.title: Justice For Tony McDade
11.subtitle: Tony McDade was a transgender black man who got killed by police in Tallahassee. Sign this petition and encourage others to do so as well to get his name out there.

12.title: The Black Family in the Age of Mass Incarceration
12.subtitle: By author Ta-Nehisi Coates: Fifty years after Daniel Patrick Moynihan’s report “The Negro Family” tragically helped create this system, it's time to reclaim his original intent.

12.title: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.
12.subtitle: We carry grooming products that are primarily geared towards the bearded community, but we also have women and children using them as well. Our oil, balm, and butter are excellent for the hair on your head, and the butter can also double as a lotion.

products.description: Black Beard Brigade's beard butter is designed to feel more natural and less oily than others on the market. Adds the finishing touches for beard renewal and restoration.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

products.name: Premium Classic Beard Oil
products.description: Black Beard Brigade's beard oil is designed to tone, nourish, and clear the skin underneath the beard. It feels more natural and less oily than others on the market. It is made from 100% natural ingredients that promote a fuller & thicker beard.
products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

products.name: GL Long Sleeve Shirts
products.description: This well-loved favorite features a classic crew neck, long sleeves, and superior combed and ring-spun jersey cotton. products.shopName: Black Beard Brigade Men's Grooming Co.

13.title: 3 Drs. & A Plan
13.subtitle:
3 Drs. & A Plan was created out of the drive to help goal-driven educators pursue their dreams. You have a bright future ahead of you but you may not know the right steps to take or how to get started. With our trained life coaches and educational career advisors, we will help you set attainable goals and create the right plan to make your hopes and wishes come true. 

As a life coach and career consultant, we help teachers deal with issues on an individual basis and determine the proper strategy for their needs.

13.title: Afro Flow Yoga
13.subtitle:
With over 14 years of experience, Leslie Salmon Jones continues to pursue an active interdisciplinary career in health and dance in Boston and New York City. A Toronto native, Leslie received her B.A. in Dance and Health Studies at the State University of New York, and her Fitness Instructors Certification at New York University. She was a scholarship recipient at the esteemed Alvin Ailey Dance Theatre in New York City as well as the London Contemporary Dance School.

As a professional dancer, Leslie worked with known greats such as Judith Jameson, Bill T. Jones and Wynton Marsalis. At her studio in New York, she developed her own exercise program based on various techniques honed through working with her personal training clientele on a daily basis. Today she continues to divide her time between New York City and Boston.

Leslie has extensive experience in the fitness industry, including being a consultant for the New York Knicks healthy lifestyle clinic that teaches self-esteem to youth. She also served as a board member for the organization, Free Arts for Abused Kids, NYC. Today, she serves as a board member of the United Nations Association of New York

14.title: Racism has a cost for everyone
14.subtitle: Racism makes our economy worse — and not just in ways that harm people of color, says public policy expert Heather C. McGhee. From her research and travels across the US, McGhee shares startling insights into how racism fuels bad policymaking and drains our economic potential — and offers a crucial rethink on what we can do to create a more prosperous nation for all.

14.title: Tyre Nichols remembered as beautiful soul with creative eye
14.subtitle: On most weekends, Tyre Nichols would head to the city park, train his camera on the sky and wait for the sun to set. Learn more in this article from the Associated Press.

products.name: Serenity candle

16.title: Harriet Tubman - Biography
16.subtitle: Harriet Tubman was an escaped enslaved woman who became a "conductor" on the Underground Railroad, leading enslaved people to freedom before the Civil War, all while carrying a bounty on her head. But she was also a nurse, a Union spy and a women’s suffrage supporter.

16.title: Book: The Global Beauty Industry
16.subtitle: Colorism, Racism, and the National Body

products.description: A Reed Diffuser is a great solution for offices, small rooms, or any place when a flame isn't desired. Each Reed Diffuser is a 6-ounce square glass bottle with a replaceable seal. Each bottle comes with its own set of 8 reeds.

products.name: McBride Sisters Collection Black Girl Magic 2018 California Merlot
products.description: This juicy and sensational wine is a classic Merlot, sophisticated for the wine connoisseur and delicious for the wine novices.

18.title: How the Negro National League Was Formed | Field of Dreams...Deferred
18.subtitle: The Negro National League debuted 100 years ago with world-class players and legions of fans. Hear how founder Rube Foster formed the league in Part 1 of "Field of Dreams...Deferred," a four-part series from TBS.

19.title: Princess Omalie
19.subtitle: Welcome To The Wonderful World Of Princess Omalie Unlock the magic and lore of The kingdom of IgboOrai, Africa’s oldest Monarchy and greatest dynasty of kings and queens! We’ve been waiting for you!

products.name: Princess Omalie Doll – Gala Edition
products.description: Princess Omalie comes from a royal lineage of beautiful elegant women and embodies the kindness, confidence and excitement of young girls today. In this Gala Edition, she is exquisitely dressed and coiffed.

products.name: Princess Omalie Doll – Coronation Edition
products.description: Princess Omalie comes from a royal lineage of beautiful elegant women and embodies the kindness, confidence and excitement of young girls today. In this Coronation Edition, she is exquisitely dressed and coifed in a rich, soft cape and a smooth silky costume, designed by "Atelier de Babazongo" – dressmakers of the Royal family. As a treat, she holds a special key as your invitation to unlock the magic of her kingdom.

products.name: Princess Omalie, The Coronation And The Polka Dot Lamb
products.description: Princess Omalie of the African kingdom of IgboOrai could be the happiest girl on the planet — except that her family has been under a curse. Unless the curse of the Goliath beetle necklace is lifted, Omalie’s father might die in a horrible freak accident. He might never be crowned king. Omalie worries about her family, and about her own safety; how will she ever lead a peaceful happy life, have friends, and go to school?

19.title: Walking While Black
19.subtitle: Garnette Cadogan on the Realities of Being Black in America

20.title: Diarrablu
20.subtitle: The Diarrablu mission is to iterate for sustainability while highlighting the African continent’s rich colors and unique patterns through practical and versatile pieces designed using mathematical concepts or algorithms.

products.name: Sustainable Mailys Dress - Noir

products.name: Headwrap - Suto
products.description: These statement pieces are part of our zero-waste sustainable approach as we believe in maximizing the usage of all our fabrics.

products.name: Hidden in Ocho Rios | Art Print

20.title: White Fragility: Why It's So Hard for White People to Talk About Racism
20.subtitle: This book explicates the dynamics of White Fragility and how we might build our capacity in the on-going work towards racial justice.

21.title: Did you really just say that?
21.subtitle: Here's advice on how to confront microaggressions, whether you're a target, bystander or perpetrator

21.title: Land Acknowledgement App
21.subtitle: Text the name of a city and state to 855-917-5263 to find out the Indigenous people of that place.

22.title: Smell Good Spa
22.subtitle: Established in 1998, we are purveyors of aromatic products for women who are making a conscientious change in their personal care products. Our products are the cherry-on-top for women who love to live good, feel good and smell good, wholesomely.

22.title: Brown Toy Box
22.subtitle: Our mission is to normalize Black excellence and create prosperous career pathways for Black children through STEAM education, cultural representation and educational play.

23.title: Why Seeing Yourself Represented on Screen Is So Important
23.subtitle: "Black Panther" has been hailed as a model success story for depicting diversity on screen. According to past research, the representation of minority groups in mass media has a powerful educational impact on audiences.

23.title: Divided We Fall. Ignorant We Fail.
23.subtitle: This book is a non-fiction introspective of the country’s response to the first black President.

24.title: Color of Change
24.subtitle: Color Of Change was founded in moments just like this one. As Black communities reeled in grief as all levels of government failed to protect Black people in the wake of Hurricane Katrina, we recognized that not enough of the people and institutions with power over our lives had any fear of disappointing Black people. For the last 15 years, we've focused on building that power.

24.title: Juneteenth is a federal holiday. What comes next?
24.subtitle: As President Biden signed the Juneteenth National Independence Day Act into law, he acknowledged a current struggle for voting rights.

products.name: Ka'oir Waist Eraser™

products.name: Ka'oir Body Sweat™

products.name: Ka'oir Slimming Tea
products.description: KA’OIR Slimming Tea is a loose leaf tea packed in individual nylon tea bags that contains a powerful blend of natural ingredients to help slim your body! Each package includes 14 bags (78.4 grams) of detox tea, and is meant to be used every day or every other day.

25.subtitle: Sade and Rachel are a mother-daughter duo creating high-performance body care products that make your skin feel great. products.name: Body Care Set 1 - Normal Skin
products.description: The essentials kit features everything you need to keep maintain your skin health. Start with a new skinfood routine and feed it nutrient-rich superfoods all day, every day.

products.name: Go Clean Starter Kit | Body Care Set

26.title: Jackie Robinson's Effect on the Negro Leagues & MLB | 'Field of Dreams...Deferred'
26.subtitle: Things actually got tougher for Black baseball players after Jackie Robinson broke the color barrier, as MLB teams followed racist quotas and the Negro Leagues died out. "Many talented Black players got phased out."

26.title: Understanding My Privilege
26.subtitle: University Chancellor, Susan E. Borrego, reflects on her life as an emancipated minor and dissects the emotionally charged conversation surrounding race relations in the United States. This raconteur uses her powerful first-person account of "White Privilege" and "Black Lives Matter" to underscore the responsibility each one of us has to bring about change.

27.title: Smile Natural Products
27.subtitle: After struggling to find an ethical, big-brand hygiene company, Founder and Chief Executive Officer Brian Mays decided to create one with Smile Natural Products.

products.name: Toothpaste Sampler Pack
products.description: Can't choose? Try all four toothpaste flavors and find your favorite! Mint + Charcoal, Cinnamon + Clove, Vanilla + Lavender, Ginger + Turmeric

products.name: Aromatherapy Diffuser
products.description: The Aromatherapy Diffuser scents your home to your mood!  Add our 100%, pure essential oils to this handmade, ceramic diffuser to freshen up any room in your home.

products.name: Lavender Essential Oil
products.description: Bulgarian Lavender Essential Oil is a common favorite in aromatherapy use. Lavender is well known for its calming properties, as well as being the most versatile essential oil out there.

27.title: Shades of My Melanin LLC
27.subtitle: At Shades of My Melanin, our goal is to not only offer products that make you feel beautiful in your own skin but to offer products that tell a story for each and every person who wears them. We offer fun, colorful, and creative products that can be worn by all ages.

28.title: Aloha Glamour
28.subtitle:
Aloha Glamour is a lifestyle movement that promotes women loving themselves wholeheartedly. We are a community of women that empower others to use find and use their voice to turn their tragedies into triumphs and their mess into a message which enables them to build from the inside out...seeing and LIVING in color again. 

Thanks to our inspiring collections and our impeccable customer service, we have been highly successful since day one. Browse through our site and check out the latest additions to our collection, and feel free to get in touch with our team if you need any assistance.

We want you to create a story in each and every Aloha Glamour piece that you wear. What's the color of your story?

28.title: #ChooseToChallenge - International Women's Day
28.subtitle: A challenged world is an alert world. Individually, we're all responsible for our own thoughts and actions - all day, every day. We can all choose to challenge and call out gender bias and inequality. We can all choose to seek out and celebrate women's achievements. Collectively, we can all help create an inclusive world. From challenge comes change, so let's all choose to challenge.

29.title: American Civil Liberties Union
29.subtitle: Donate to the ACLU. The ACLU has been at the center of nearly every major civil liberties battle in the U.S. for over 100 years. This vital work depends on the support of ACLU members in all 50 states and beyond.

29.title: Accountability in a Time of Justice
29.subtitle: Accountability is a well-worn word in social justice circles. We have worked hard to figure out what accountability means to us as we attempt to walk our social justice talk.

30.title: Elements of Aliel
30.subtitle: Elements of Aliel is a collection of products that are gentle, yet effective and made with nature and love. We focus on ingredient quality to bring you plant powered goodness that rivals anything you an find on the market today.

products.name: Glow Essence
products.description: This multitasking master is all you need to moisturize, soften texture, reduce appearance of dark spots and fine lines due to dryness, and even skin tone. This lightweight but powerful formula delivers a healthy dose of vitamins and minerals that are quickly absorbed by the skin.

products.name: Love Cleanser
products.description: Our Love Cleanser is a gentle cream cleanser that deep cleans pores and gently exfoliates the skin. The combination of pure African Black Soap, hibiscus and organic cocoa powder work to clear breakouts, reduce the appearance of dark spots and moisturize the skin.

products.name: I’m Beet Clay Mask
products.description: Formulated with Moroccan Red Clay, Rose Hip and Beet Root this vitamin C rich mask will refresh your skin!

30.title: Feed Love
30.subtitle: Our mission is to create a culture, through quality apparel, where seeing, being and feeding love, can change the world.

31.title: The police who killed Tyre Nichols were Black. But they might still have been driven by racism
31.subtitle: CNN's Van Jones puts his thoughts to paper in this opinion piece in the role racism played in the killing of Tyre Nichols at the hands of 5 Black police officers in Memphis.

31.title: Grace & Styles Boutique
31.subtitle: Grace & Styles Boutique is a provider of quality leather handbags and must-have accessories.  We provide a variety of colors and trendy styles at affordable prices to suite everyone!

products.name: Clear handbag in blue and black
